messages.title: We need a new energetic MP
messages.content: It is time for a change in this constituency. I believe that John, with his enthusiasm and energy, is the right person to represent young people like me. John will make an excellent MP and I know that he is committed to stand up for the ordinary people who have been most affected by the recession. We need to make sure that health and education services are protected and voting for John will ensure that the Tories will not be able to implement their plans to cut these vital services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring that health and education services are protected.
Promote new industries to create jobs in the future and enable high speed broadband in all communities.
Opposed to tax cuts for the 3,000 wealthiest estates and against plans to reduce the inheritance tax.

issues.health: Over 44,000 more doctors and 89,000 more nurses under Labour.

housing.content: I shall fight for high quality, affordable homes for our children.

contactInformation.address: SE Cambs Labour Party, Goodwin House, Willie Snaith Road, Newmarket, CB8 7SG

endorsements.endorsement: John will make an excellent MP and is committed to stand up for the ordinary people most affected by the recession.

images.caption: John Cowan pointing at a sign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Pledges include fighting for high quality homes, promoting improved sporting and recreational facilities, supporting alcohol awareness programs, removing barriers for tech companies, and promoting constitutional change.
